question: Provide PMIDs supporting that ERBB2 Overexpression confers sensitivity to Capecitabine.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ERBB2 Overexpression'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Capecitabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Capecitabine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Capecitabine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Provide PMIDs supporting that BRCA2 Mutation confers sensitivity to Gemcitabine.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BRCA2 Mutation'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Gemcitabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gemcitabine'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gemcitabine')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EGFR Amplification'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Talazoparib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Talazoparib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Talazoparib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'ERBB2 L755W'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Neratinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Neratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Neratinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'CBL S80N AND CBL H94Y'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('SU11274')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('SU11274'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('SU11274')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'TFG TFG::ROS1 Fusion'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dovitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dovitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dovitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'KIT V559G'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sunitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sunitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sunitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'CDK9 Overexpression'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dinaciclib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dinaciclib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dinaciclib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Imatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Margetuximab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Margetuximab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Margetuximab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
